Collapsible Dog Leash: A dog leash that folds down into a compact and portable size for easy storage and transportation.
Self-Cleaning Dog Leash: A dog leash that is made of a special material that automatically cleans itself of dirt and debris after the dog has been outside.
LED Dog Leash: A dog leash that is equipped with LED lights that can be customized to different colors and patterns to enhance visibility during nighttime walks.
Dog Leash with Built-in Camera: A dog leash that has a built-in camera that allows the owner to monitor the dog's activity and behavior while they are away.
Adjustable Dog Leash: A dog leash that has a unique design that allows the owner to adjust the tension and length of the leash with a simple twist or pull.
